description: Audit all existing GraphQL queries/mutations embedded in TSX files and extract reusable fragments into separate .graphql files. Create fragments for common entities: UserFragment, LegalDocumentFragment, NotificationFragment, AuditLogFragment, LegalQueryFragment. Store fragments in apps/web/src/graphql/fragments/ directory. Ensure fragments include all fields currently used in inline queries.
